OpenClinica Enterprise


3.1 View Datasets Help

This section allows you to view all the datasets that are assigned to your current study. All datasets are ordered using their Dataset Name. You can choose to reorder the list of datasets by toggling the ascending or descending arrow located next to the Dataset Name header. Similarly, you can also reorder the subject list using the dataset’s Description, Created By, Created Date, or Status, and toggle their respective ascending or descending arrows.

1. Find

The Find function, located at the top of the dataset list, allows you to search for a set of datasets based on their Dataset Name or Description.
2. Description

This cell provides a brief description for each dataset.
3. Created By

This cell indicates the creator of each dataset.
4. Created Date

This cell indicates the date the dataset was created.
5. Status

This cell indicates the current status of each dataset.
6. Actions View (Magnifying Glass Icon)
Clicking on the View button will allow you to see all the details associated with the particular dataset.
Edit (Pencil Icon)
Clicking on the Edit button will allow you to edit the Name, Description, and Status of the particular dataset.
Remove ('X' Icon)
Clicking on the Remove button will allow you to remove the selected dataset. The dataset will no longer be accessible to users of OpenClinica. Once removed, the dataset can be restored by an OpenClinica administrator. NOTE: Removing a dataset will not delete any data from the study.
Export (Page & Arrow Icon)
Clicking on the Export button will allow you to export the dataset using one of the available formats. Once the file is generated, it can be saved locally to your hard drive and viewed in a text editor, an excel spreadsheet, or any of a number of analytical software applications. Data may also be viewed online in HTML format.

In addition to viewing all the datasets, you are also presented with links to Show only My Datasets and to Create Dataset.
